Kapital is a father and son brand that was originally founded in 1985 in the Okayama Prefecture in Japan. In the beginning, Kapital was started by Toshikiyo Hirata (Father) after traveling abroad to teach Karate in the United States where he fell in love with mid-century American denim.

Established in 1984, Kapital’s name comes from Japan’s ‘denim capital’ Kojima. A kooky take on utilitarian-inspired workwear, Kapital creates original menswear using Japanese production techniques perfected across the decades.
